required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Investigate the Safety of SYHA1815 in Subjects With Unresectable Locally Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center, Open-label, Dose Escalation and Expansion, Phase I Study to Investigate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics (PK) Characteristic of SYHA1815 in Subjects With Unresectable Locally Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors

lead_sponsor.agency: Shanghai Runshi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd

clinical_study.source: Shanghai Runshi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multi-center, open-label, dose escalation and expansion, phase I study to investigate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics (PK) and pharmacodynamics (PD) characteristics, preliminary efficacy of SYHA1815 in subjects with unresectable locally advanced or metastatic solid tumors. Once the expected effective dose is identified, the dose expansion study will be started to further evaluate the safety, clinical activity and PK profile of SYHA1815 in subjects with unresectable locally advanced or metastatic solid tumors.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a multi-center, open-label, dose escalation and expansion, phase I study to investigate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics (PK) and pharmacodynamics (PD) characteristics, preliminary efficacy of SYHA1815 in subjects with unresectable locally advanced or metastatic solid tumors. The dose escalation study will include six dose cohorts starting at 2 mg/day. Once the expected effective dose is identified, the dose expansion study will be started to further evaluate the safety, clinical activity and PK profile of SYHA1815 in subjects with unresectable locally advanced or metastatic solid tumors.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with Dose-limiting Toxicities
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through 28 days after the first dose of study drug
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with Dose-limiting Toxicities

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse events and SAEs
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of adverse events and SAEs defined by the Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events version 5.0 (CTCAE V5.0).

primary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine blood test
primary_outcome.description: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine blood test

primary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in blood biochemistry test
primary_outcome.description: Clinically significant changes from baseline in blood biochemistry test

primary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine urine test
primary_outcome.description: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine urine test

primary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in coagulation function test
primary_outcome.description: Clinically significant changes from baseline in coagulation function test

primary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in 12-lead electrocardiogram (ECG)
primary_outcome.description: Clinically significant changes from baseline in 12-lead electrocardiogram (ECG)

primary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in vital signs examination
primary_outcome.description: Clinically significant changes from baseline in vital signs examination

primary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in physical examination
primary_outcome.description: Clinically significant changes from baseline in physical examination

secondary_outcome.description: Assessed by Blinded Independent Review Committee (IRC) per RECIST Version 1.1

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time 0 to time t (AUC0-t)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time 0 to time t (AUC0-t)

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time 0 to infinity (AUCinf)
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve from time 0 to infinity (AUCinf)

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent total clearance of the drug from plasma after oral administration (CL/F)
secondary_outcome.description: Apparent total clearance of the drug from plasma after oral administration (CL/F)

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent volume of distribution during terminal phase after non-intravenous administration (Vz/F)
secondary_outcome.description: Apparent volume of distribution during terminal phase after non-intravenous administration (Vz/F)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in serum phosphate
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in serum phosphate

secondary_outcome.measure: Potential population who benefit from the study drug
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the efficacy of the study drug in patients with different indications according to the results of anti-tumor response rate in the corresponding indications.

secondary_outcome.measure: Correlation between the changes of RET/FGFR gene and efficacy
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of patients with RET/FGFR gene in patients who benefit from the study drug will be assessed.

arm_group.description: Six dose levels will be tested. The dose-limiting toxicity (DLT) will be assessed from the first administration of SYHA1815 to the end of the first cycle (28 days).
Once the expected effective dose is determined, four expansion cohorts will be started to further evaluate the safety, clinical activity and PK profile of SYHA1815.

overall_official.affiliation: CSPC Zhongqi Pharmaceutical Technology (Shijiazhuang) Co., Ltd

clinical_study.keyword: Locally advanced unresectable or metastatic solid tumors
